title: We TRANSFORMED This Viewer's Gaming PC!
tags: how to build a corsair gaming pc
how to use corsair icue link
description: SPONSORS: Learn more about the Corsair iCUE Link ecosystem:  LG UltraGear (45GR95QE) $400 OFF on Best Buy US:   We went out in search of a gaming PC in desperate need of a makeover in the Orlando, FL area. Along came a dirty rig with a questionable motherboard choice, odd layout, and mismatched components... and we TRANSFORMED it thanks to Corsair's new iCUE Link ecosystem! Let's dive in!   Consider supporting us on Patreon!   Shop additional LG deals: LG UltraGear (45GR95QE) $400 OFF Official:  LG UltraGear (27GR95QE) $150 OFF on Amazon US:  LG UltraGear (27GR95QE) $150 OFF LG Official:   SPONSOR: Snag a VIP-SCDKey OEM Windows 10 Pro key for $16 and use code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:  Windows 11 ($22):  Office 2021($56):    My cleaning gear:  SYINE Respirator Mask:  Scott Shop Towels:  Electric Air Duster:  ONSON Cordless Vacuum:  Medical Grade 99.9% Isopropyl Alcohol:  Q-tips Cotton Swabs:  Xool 80 Precision Tool Set:  Hizek Black Disposable Gloves:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony A7C (Primary):  Sony a6600 (Secondary):  Sony a6400 (Webcam):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:    Channel music provided by Monstercat:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
